title: SecureBoost: A Lossless Federated Learning Framework
summaries: propose __a lossless gradient-tree boosting algorithm__, to preserve data privacy and maintain a high-quality model over vertically partitioned data in FL
SecureBoost contains [1] data alignment [2] the shared gradient-tree boosting model learning
